title: CS 564 + CS 537
comments: Should be fine. Just set aside enough time for projects.

I'm currently doing this combo, and it's definitely manageable. But start on projects early as there will definitely be weeks where certain projects can be time-consuming. Take some relatively light courses along with it.
Yeah like others said should be manageable. Just really gotta make sure you stay on top of your work and don’t get behind or you’ll be screwed becuase bother are decently time consuming classes
